modName: TGirls of Skyrim - TS Revamped - Alexina and Stella as followers
summary: ATTENTION!!! Transsexual Content. Read the description first! Won\'t download it if you have certainly you don\'t like or sympathize with it. Respect the people...
descriptionHtml:
-DESCRIPTION-

This is an adaptation from original [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23337]Girls of Skyrim - PATCH[/url] based on the first original [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21038]Girs of Skyrim[/url] and also a complement to my mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21945]TGirls of Skyrim - TS Revamped - Dragonborn Servants[/url].  I just replace the original bodies with transsexual bodies from \"Transgender body mod\", modifying the textures also. So, the real credits goes to basskimm, Grospolina, ISC9 , Nalin and lion_spirit who uploaded the file from \"Transgender body mod\" on Nexus.

!!Update!!

1.1 : Added optional texture to Alexina be compatible with the CBBEv3M armor mod. You will probably see a small seam at the waist and crotch when she get naked, but nothing so ugly.


LOCATION:
-You will find them in the \"Riverwood Sleeping Giant inn\"

ISSUES: I didn\'t make the body and hand textures match perfectly yet. Sometimes, depends the ambience light, the seam appears on the arm. I think is more evident with ENB activated.

*If you want download my first \"TGirs of Skyrim\" mod go to:[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21945]TGirls of Skyrim - TS Revamped - Dragonborn Servants[/url]


!!THANKS!! 

Thanks to basskimm who made this wonderful mod.
Thanks to Grospolina by the incredible idea of ??adding these two sexy girls made ??by basskimm as followers.
Thanks to ISC9 and Nalim who did the transgender bodies.
Thanks also to AnTiWoMaAgNoT and  navetsea by the textures.

***If you want to download the original mods go to: 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21038]Girs of Skyrim[/url] by basskimm

and

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23337]Girls of Skyrim - PATCH[/url] by Grospolina
author: TBoy79
